ygData.subject: Re: quest help / armor question
ygData.msgSnippet: High elves can wear both small and medium armour.  :-)   The dwarven tunic is small so a human could not wear it but high elves, dwarves etc can. Llorfindal
ygData.messageBody:
High elves can wear both small and medium armour. :-) The dwarven tunic is small so a human could not wear it but high elves, dwarves etc can.

Llorfindal
High Elf Paladin of Tunare

-----Original Message-----
From: Clanretri@... [mailto:Clanretri@...]

everquest@onelist.com; lifebanez@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] quest help / armor question


From: Clanretri@...

Hail all!

I have a question about the Paladin quest in Nfreeport. It's the one about
the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know where i can find those
tokens he did not give any hints whatsoever:(
Also the dwarven ringmail tunic, i understand that's it's for small races
only? but I seen a couple of high-elves wearing them, so is it possible for
human to wear it as well?
Any help will be greatly appreciated, thanx!


Bobaliya
